description:
The Daily News is a must-have mobile application for people living, working and enjoying all the Emerald Coast has to offer. Stay connected wherever you go with this mobile companion to the Northwest Florida Daily News, the newspaper of record for Santa Rosa, Okaloosa and Walton counties. Get essential news and information around the clock from the Daily News’ team of reporters and photographers. Access local news stories plus sports, entertainment, photos and much more. Straightforward design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading at your leisure. Share content through e-mail, Facebook and twitter. Try our app and tell your friends!

The Daily News app is an ad-supported application.
